letters.description: Utilize Byosen Reikan to detect energetic imbalances and blockages within the client's auric field.
Establish a sacred space and open the practitioner's channel to serve as a pure conduit for Reiki energy.
Apply targeted hand positions to release stagnant Ki and emotional congestion held within the chakras.
Infuse the subtle bodies with Universal Life Force energy to replenish vitality and promote cellular healing.
Ground the energy through the root chakra and lower dantian to ensure the client feels stable and integrated.
Guide the client to internalize the healing state and apply the Five Reiki Principles to their daily life.
